text:
Hello!
I tried to migrate to Private App, but I couldn’t add scope `conversations.visitor_identification.tokens.create` to use Visitor Identification API.
Any idea why this scope is not available for my Account?

I guess this is because I have free Account.
Is there development option to test it out without paying?

This looks amazing, I’ve always missed the ui for fields in the cli and the global partials is brilliant, that’s the biggest flaw with the design manager to me, trying to keep modules consistent across a theme!
You can definitely build a modal with some html
Thanks Matt! My thoughts exactly!
Thanks
It is, thank you
You are awesome!
Wow! Thank you
For sure
For sure

I’ve created a CMS Developer Sandbox portal account (2 with the same name actually, accidentally), and I want to delete one of them. I click here (see image) and enter my email for confirmation, but it returns a 400 bad request error. Any ideas on how I can delete / remove myself from one of these accounts?
I’ve been through the HubSpot help chat twice to no avail as well. :sob:
Hi, all! I'm having trouble making my iframe embed code be responsive on my HubSpot web page. I've tried tweaking the width/height and adding some CSS but still stuck. Any thoughts??
I found <https://css-tricks.com/responsive-iframes/|this article> that might help get you headed in the right direction, but I haven't had a chance to test how it would work in a HubSpot module.
could you try renaming one of them?
if you rename both of them to be unique, maybe it will refresh the error. not sure this will work since they have different portal IDs, but worth a shot
Yeah, the rename worked as far as renaming the account portal, but still getting the error. Seems to be a bug with HubSpot’s code, so I imagine it doesn’t work for anyone.
Chat rep recommended I deleted my entire user account, which I’m sure isn’t what I want, lol.
oh no, that would be awful
maybe keep both and just rename them so you always use the right one
Yeah, I guess I’ll do that, thanks. Still hurts my OCD though.
Is it only possible to sync from production to sandbox, and not vice versa? Would like to use our sandbox as a staging environment.
I see someone mentioned about 10 months ago that this was in beta, but I’m not seeing it there now. Is this able to be done normally now, or did they scrap the idea?
Hi Amber, would you have some knowledge in this area that you could share as well? thanks in advance
Do HubSpot redirect support regex?
Support said it was supported but could not find an official documentation aside from flexible pattern
